title: Just a little type
content:
A visual essay of my drawings from trips to visit family in Cuba is online at time.com. There is just a little type, and it’s awkward hand drawn stuff to boot, but I thought some nice folks here would like to check it out anyways:

[http://www.time.com/time/photoessays/2006/rodriguez\_drawings/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185043/http:/www.time.com/time/photoessays/2006/rodriguez_drawings/)

Thanks
author: ER

comments.content:
Fabulous Edel. Love the fiery colors. Thanks for posting this…

peace
Wonderful drawings, Edel. I know relatively little about Cuba, but your images give me a taste.

Many thanks for checking it out. I appreciate it.

ER
Great stuff, I like the heavy line work against the vibrant colours.
